page.title: 17SPORT IN CRANLEIGH
page.content: There are many forms of sport for all ages in Cranleigh. The two football club and the rugby club have teams playing in local leagues as well as training and matches for boys from 8 years. The Cranleigh Swimming Club compete all over the south of England and have several County swimmers. There is also water_polo, sub_aqua and life_saving. There are two cricket club, the senior one called Cranleigh C.C. play on the village green. During August this green is transformed into grass courts for Tennis Week. Many competitors attend from abroad and there are matches for family, young and local players. A new running club has been formed and tennis, badminton, squash, karate,judo,weight_training and keep_fit are available.
